content: We're seeing ongoing improvement in our infrastructure business, which becomes cash flow -- which became cash flow positive exiting 2021 and has continued that trend in the first quarter of 2022, the overall infrastructure backdrop remains strong. Our sand division sold approximately 329,000 tons of sand during the first quarter of 2022 compared to 171,000 tons of sand during the same quarter last year, and 270,000 tons of sand during the fourth quarter of 2021. Adjusted EBITDA, as defined and reconciled in our earnings release was $9.3 million for the first quarter of 2022 as compared to $9.2 million for the first quarter of 2021 and $17.2 million for the fourth quarter of 2021.
